description: This Java source file defines the class RemoteHostServiceHandle, which extends ServiceHandle to represent services hosted on remote hosts, including methods for managing remote IP addresses and identifying the host location type.

classes.name: RemoteHostServiceHandle
classes.description: A ServiceHandle implementation to represent services on remote hosts, with management of remote IP addresses and host location properties.

methods.name: RemoteHostServiceHandle
methods.description: Constructor initializing the RemoteHostServiceHandle with name, ipc, event, and IP address, optionally with visibility.

methods.name: getRemoteIp
methods.description: Returns the remote IP address associated with this service handle.

methods.name: setRemoteIp
methods.description: Sets the remote IP address for this service handle.

methods.name: isSameProcess
methods.description: Indicates whether the service is running in the same process (always returns false).

methods.name: isLocalHost
methods.description: Indicates whether the service is on the local host (always returns false).

methods.name: isRemoteHost
methods.description: Indicates whether the service is on a remote host (always returns true).
